sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO dev_menu_opt (id, menu_id, opt_code, opt_name, opt_url, opt_type,opt_order, status, created, create_time, updated, update_time, func_name, func_para, func_content, open_type, display_type, design_page_url, form_id, url_para) VALUES (#id#, #menuId#, #optCode#, #optName#, #optUrl#, #optType#,#optOrder#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#, #funcName#, #funcPara#, #funcContent#, #openType#, #displayType#, #designPageUrl#, #formId#, #urlPara#)
sqlMap.delete: update dev_menu_opt set status='0' where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id, menu_id as menuId, opt_code as optCode, opt_name as optName, opt_url as optUrl, opt_type as optType, opt_order as optOrder, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime, func_name as funcName, func_para as funcPara, func_content as funcContent, open_type as openType, display_type as displayType, design_page_url as designPageUrl, form_id as formId, url_para as urlPara from dev_menu_opt where id=#id# and status='1'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE dev_menu_opt SET id = #id# , menu_id = #menuId#, opt_code = #optCode#, opt_name = #optName#, opt_url = #optUrl#, opt_type = #optType#, opt_order = #optOrder#, status = #status#, created = #created#, create_time = #createTime#, updated = #updated#, update_time = #updateTime#, func_name =#funcName#, func_para = #funcPara#, func_content = #funcContent#, open_type = #openType#, display_type = #displayType#, design_page_url = #designPageUrl#, form_id = #formId#, url_para = #urlPara# WHERE id = #id# and status='1'
sqlMap.select: SELECT id, menu_id as menuId, opt_code as optCode, opt_name as optName, opt_url as optUrl, opt_type as optType, opt_order as optOrder, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime, func_name as funcName, func_para as funcPara, func_content as funcContent, open_type as openType, display_type as displayType, design_page_url as designPageUrl, form_id as formId, url_para as urlPara from dev_menu_opt where status='1' order by opt_order

SELECT id, menu_id as menuId, opt_code as optCode, opt_name as optName, opt_url as optUrl, opt_type as optType, opt_order as optOrder, status, created, create_time as createTime, updated, update_time as updateTime, func_name as funcName, func_para as funcPara, func_content as funcContent, open_type as openType, display_type as displayType, design_page_url as designPageUrl, form_id as formId, url_para as urlPara from dev_menu_opt where 1=1 and status='1'
order by opt_order
